synopsis.text:
Kurou, a 12th-century swordsman, finds himself on the run after losing a power struggle with his brother, who has become the first Shogun to rule all of Japan. Seeking refuge in a remote mountain hermitage, he encounters the enigmatic and captivating Kuromitsu. Despite her dark secret and the forbidden chamber within her home, Kurou becomes infatuated with her, leading him to discover her immortal nature and the power her blood holds. After being fatally wounded, Kurou drinks Kuromitsu's blood, gaining immortality and strange abilities.

In a cruel twist of fate, Kurou is decapitated and awakens centuries later in a dystopian future where the Red Army, who had been pursuing Kuromitsu for her blood, now dominates the landscape. With Kuromitsu missing and the Red Army still in pursuit, Kurou embarks on a timeless quest to reunite with his lost love and exact vengeance on those who seek to exploit her immortal gift. As he navigates this dangerous new world, Kurou must confront the depths of his obsession and the lengths he will go to protect the woman who has captivated him for a millennium.
